alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 6:31AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kittson and northern Pembina Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 630 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bathgate, or 30 miles north of Grafton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cavalier, Pembina, Neche, St. Vincent, Hamilton, Bathgate and Leroy. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 209 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
